channel.title: Changing the temporary directory on JIPipe for ImageJ
channel.description: Recent content in Changing the temporary directory on JIPipe for ImageJ

item.title: Step 1
item.description: Navigate to the Project menu (red arrow 1), followed by the Applications settings option (red arrow 2).

item.title: Step 2
item.description: Choose Runtime (red arrow 2), activate the Override temporary directory (red arrow 3), and select/create a new target directory (red arrow 4) for the temporary result files. The settings are automatically saved.
